thread.title: 'X-Men' Series Ordered to Pilot By Fox!
thread.title_full: 'X-Men' Series Ordered to Pilot By Fox!

author: Just Jared
title: 'X-Men' Series Ordered to Pilot By Fox!
text:
X-Men is headed to television with a new series that was just ordered to pilot by Fox!
The untitled project has a script that is getting great buzz from execs at the network and producers are getting ready to explore casting for the show.
The new series “focuses on two ordinary parents who discover that their children possess mutant powers. Forced to go on the run from a hostile government, the family joins up with an underground network of mutants and must fight to survive,” according to Deadline .
Another X-Men -themed series is headed to TV soon on FX, the new show Legion !
